metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7751 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The svg_probe function in libavformat/img2dec.c in FFmpeg through 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Infinite Loop) via a crafted XML file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec59 - 7:4.0-1
libavdevice59 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter8 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra59 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat59 - 7:4.0-1
libavutil57 - 7:4.0-1
libpostproc56 - 7:4.0-1
libswresample4 - 7:4.0-1
libswscale6 - 7:4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0-1').
gst-libav1.0 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
mythtv package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
